roleset.name: program again

example.name: args 2, 3
example.text: They 're saying it 's a variant that was reprogrammed help hackers gain control over the accounts to obtain financial and other personal info .
example.arg: help hackers gain control over the accounts to obtain financial and other personal info

example.name: uh oh...
example.text: I recently reprogrammed it with your custom thing and the lights keep flashing and the mod won't work.

example.name: voting machine terror
example.text: We could have reprogrammed it to steal votes, but that's been done before, and Pac-Man is more fun!

roleset.note: REPROGRAM-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from reprogram.01-v)
